metadata.description: What could drive a man to abandon all he knows and go to live with the Federation's sworn enemy? In the follow-up series to the smash hit Star Trek: Countdown movie prequel, we see for the first time the real motivations behind Spock's decision to live on Romulus, and follow as he looks back on what brought him to this place in his life. From the team that brought you Star Trek: Mirror Images!
metadata.name: Star Trek: Spock Reflections
